duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver safe patient care using the nursing process of assessment, planning, implementation, and evaluation.
Provide direct patient care within the scope of practice and maintain standards of care in the Med/Surg/Telemetry Unit.
Direct and guide patient/family teaching and activities of other nursing personnel.
Communicate with physicians about changes in patients' clinical condition, including cardiac monitoring, results of diagnostic studies, and symptomatology.
Respond quickly and accurately to changes in condition and/or response to treatment.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) required, Master of Science in Nursing preferred.
